website_summaries.verdict: A modern and practical glassware set that delivers both quality and affordability. The best value for money.
pros: Sturdy feel and solid construction holds up well to handling
“Bubble” design is attractive and offers something a little different from mainstream varieties
Set comes with a well-balanced array of sizes suitable for the whole family
Great quality at an affordable price
cons: “Bubbles” are purely decorative and won't improve grip

customer_reviews.title: They do "explode"
customer_reviews.text: I have had these a few months and I would have given them a 5 star rating except today one of the glasses shattered on it's own!!!! Thank God no one was in the kitchen..we heard a loud hatter noise and this is what we saw. I had seen a few reviews with the same issue and bought it anyway because of all the other good reviews...but I wish I didn't buy it cuz they do "explode"..☹️
customer_reviews.author: Zet

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated for a second to buy this set despite the overwhelmingly excellent reviews due to the multiple reports of glasses spontaneously breaking. I have to say, we have not had any of those issues, after using them for almost a month. Also, my husband just told today that he had dropped a glass on our granite countertop by accident, and it didn't even incur a scratch. Great set of glasses at a great price! Plus I live the design.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Nice Enough
customer_reviews.text: I don’t imagine anyone would object strenuously to these glasses’ appearance. The circular lenses on the inner surfaces may be pleasantly playful for some viewers. The effect looks stronger in the photo than to the eye, and to me they seem muddled. When backlighted, however, they cast an unusual and surprisingly attractive shadow with highlights and geometrical patterns in it - worth seeing, I'd say. You get a lot of reasonably high quality glasses for your money with this set (though only four of each size). The glass is fairly thick, which, combined with a flaring shape, makes them comfortable in the hand and enjoyable to drink from. And anyhow, who looks at glasses?
customer_reviews.author: Jack11615

customer_reviews.title: Exploding glassware
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this glassware for just a bit over a year and have been relatively pleased until this morning ... While putting glasses away in my kitchen this morning one of the tall glasses "exploded" into thousands of pieces after I placed the glass on the shelf and stepped away. The glassware was at room temperature after air drying overnight so heat and cold were not a factor. The only explanation I can find is that there must have been some flaw in the glass. I've never experienced anything like this before so needless to say I'm a bit worried about continuing to use the remaining glasses in the set.
customer_reviews.author: DEGiltz

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price! Good overall quality!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for our new home about a year ago. We love them! I think the quality and durability are great. They've even withstood my kids slinging them about in the sink. They look great too which is a bonus. We enjoy the variety in size. We don't use the small ones as often as they are very small but they still come in handy. It is a great purchase for the money. All of ours are still standing and my sister in law begs me to buy her a set she loves them so much.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: I fell in love with these glasses when I first saw them on ...
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with these glasses when I first saw them on Bed, Bath, and Beyond--I put them on my wedding registry, but BB & B was out of stock for ages until they finally pulled them from the site altogether. When I found them on Amazon (and for such a great price!), I bought them immediately. I LOVE them--they look so much nicer in person, they have a nice weight to them, and the look like lovely, quality glasses! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I waited 6 months to write this review to be sure. My only complaint is that two were broken when they showed up but they were quickly replaced. Packaging just isn’t what it should be for shipping. They look as nice as the day I bough them. They are daily use for us and in a dishwasher all the time. No scratches, no fog, just perfect. Buy them
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Real glass
customer_reviews.text: So when searching for acrylic tumblers this item came up. Without noticing I liked that it had theee different sizes and so I purchased two boxes. I received them and woooowww IT WAS GLASS. With 4 children there is no way that I can have glass for daily use. I tried returning them and returning the item I would have had to pay almost the exact amount I paid for them. Now they are just sitting in my shed with no use for them. Maybe when the kids move out in 20 years!
customer_reviews.author: EliAdr

customer_reviews.title: 3 Size Glassware set
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking glassware set with THREE sizes of glasses. Bought 2 boxes so we have 24 total glasses, 8 of each size. Only thing I would have liked would have been if they were tinted blue (match our decor better). Glasses have nice weight/balance, and the smallest is great for that morning shot of juice. Also, the granddaughter handles the small size easily. And they don't have that slab-sided restaurant look. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: D. Curran

customer_reviews.title: Nice look and durable
customer_reviews.text: Had these on our wedding registry and when we received them, we loved them so much we bought a second set! Easy to clean and haven't had any breaks or chips. Great sizes too. Tall boys, tumblers and juice glasses. Packaged very well and arrived quickly. Will order again if anything happens to the sets we have currently.
customer_reviews.author: K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses except for chips.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the glasses but .... I bought two sets and one box was not in original wrapping so my guess is, that it was a return item. Two glasses had small chips at the rim - so I took an emery board and smoothed them so I could use them. I was disappointed with that but did not want to try to hassle the return for a replacement. So I just remained annoyed about it and fixed the glasses so they were usable.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Joy

customer_reviews.title: A good, basic set of glasses.
customer_reviews.text: These aren't really fancy glasses, but they are pretty. They look like glass, not crystal, but the circle design keeps them from looking TOO plain. They are a good weight, and easy to grip, which is also a plus. Overall, I'd say they are a good, basic set of glasses for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Painchaud-Steinman

customer_reviews.title: Cracked glass, packaging flaw.
customer_reviews.text: I loved these glasses when I took them out of the box. They are simple, nice, and inexpensive so I won't be having a cow when my kids break them all eventually. I'd have given them 5 stars had one of the tall glasses not come with a huge crack halfway up the glass that stretched the entire circumfrence of it. All in all, I'm not fuming, but I really would have liked to receive an unbroken set.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great, light weight set
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted a set and in 9 months several have broken (mostly my fault....am sight limited) so i ordered another set. They are pretty, light weight which is a plus for me since I am disabled and easy clean. Only issue I have had is that was that 2 got broken in new set that where on the bottom so that tells me most likely the box was dropped. But all in all very, very please with them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, Durable glasses!!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are so great! I got them when I moved into my first apartment in December 2018 and they’re my favorite glasses! I saw other reviews of them bursting in the dishwasher or just out nowhere but figured I’d take my chances lol. I still have every cup I bought, none of them have broken or spontaneously burst. They’re very durable and have lasted through 3 moves now. I love the 3 different sizes and I love the quality. I would definitely recommend these to anyone needing a new glass set!
customer_reviews.author: jam ab

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews before purchasing these and was worried by reviewers saying their glasses 'exploded'. Well I can tell you, that does not happen. I have had these and been using them since the middle of June and they have been in and out of the dishwasher and through the heated dry cycle...no problems at all! They are very attractive. The bubble design is on the inside and does not help with the grip. They are smooth on the outside. This is the only thing I might look at modifying if I were the manufacturer. Otherwise I truly love them.
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Glass Wear
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of these glasses. They are thick yet not heavy. I accidentally hit the side of my sink with one and it did not break. I am highly impressed and am tempted to buy another set. I love the small juice glasses, they are the size of what you would find at Waffle House. The middle ones are perfect to dip cookies into and the larger ones are the perfect size to hold a coke. I feel these are the perfect glasses and very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Southern LadyTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive glassware!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived intact and on time. Initially, I purchased the set because I needed new glassware and didn't really care about designs/attractiveness. Very surprised by how nice these are -- they're very attractive and versatile! I read a few reviews with complaints regarding size -- the smaller glasses work very well on my bar as 'sipping' glasses and their design adds some nice contact to the other glassware there. Would purchase again, definitely. They have held up very well to multiple rounds of handwashing/toweling and they still look great and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Candice H.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These cups are great. They have been so durable when hitting other dishes in the sink, etc, the only thing to note is that the glass is smooth on the outside where you hold it and the indents are on the inner part of the cup. just something to note. i thought it was on the outer part.
customer_reviews.author: Neens

customer_reviews.title: Good product bad description
customer_reviews.text: The product description is incorrect there are only 11 pieces the 16 oz glass is missing one in every pack I have bought 2 packs and they were both the same and the second pack one of the 16 oz glasses was broken leaving only 2 out of the 4 that were supposed to be in the pack
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Beard

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty glass I really enjoyed these glasses very much the only thing that I didn't like about it is how they were packed in the box that was shipped to me for some reason all you had to do is put a piece of tape across the top and they win a rattled around but it didn't break any of them that's the reason why I had a check it but they're awesome glasses they really are but the back and sucked
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice everyday glassware!
customer_reviews.text: These are much nicer than I expected. I purchased these to match some cheap glasses I got at a local store and am quite pleased with them! Heavy enough to feel like you have a glass in your hand not plastic. Seem to be holding up well in the dishwasher. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: B Derringer

customer_reviews.title: These don't hold up in the long run
customer_reviews.text: After one year, using Kinetico Softened water, a Bosch dishwasher, and Finish dishwashing detergent, these glasses have deteriorated to the point that they always look dirty/scratched. I compare them to glasses purchased > 20 years ago and the older glasses have held up better, even though they were washed in military housing for years. Would get another brand.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: The placement of bubble design
customer_reviews.text: I just received galaxy bubble design drinking glasses My only surprise was the 3D bubble design is inside the glasses and smooth on the outside To me it makes more sense to have the bubbles on outside and smooth inside for optimal washing I felt like outside bubbles would fit fingers for holding but I needed new glasses so they are in my cupboard shiny and new..
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen nightmare!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product two weeks ago. I kept it in a box because I wanted to use it once I move to my apartment. I moved in today and I cleaned the cups and put them in the storage. After few hour I held something in the kitchen and when I opened the storage door, one of the big cup has burst. II was lucky that it has burst inside of the storage and my kitchen could have become a disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Shichelle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure until I dropped a butter knife on one of the glasses this afternoon - now I'm sure that these things are pretty sturdy. Can't speak for durability, as I've had them for less than a month, but they are perfect sizes and now I can attest to their sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: tr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glasses. *
customer_reviews.text: Great looking solid feeling glasses right out of the box. *Unfortunately, after a week of light use we already have our first chip so I’m not sure about the glass quality. Really odd because the glass seems to have chipped just sitting in the cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: Cam- South Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Tough.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a klutz with glassware and dishes so I tend to go on the cheaper side as I've gone through quite a few sets. These look nice and the glass is on the thicker side. I have yet to break one over the few weeks since receiving, they've survived small drops and being tipped over in the sink. Also we like having the three sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K

customer_reviews.title: I fell in love with these glasses when I first saw them on ...
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with these glasses when I first saw them on Bed, Bath, and Beyond--I put them on my wedding registry, but BB & B was out of stock for ages until they finally pulled them from the site altogether. When I found them on Amazon (and for such a great price!), I bought them immediately. I LOVE them--they look so much nicer in person, they have a nice weight to them, and the look like lovely, quality glasses! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchee

customer_reviews.title: I'm very very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. They shipped super fast, nothing was broken, their perfect. I'm going through my entire house replacing everything that is old and cruddy. Crap I've had for years. My kitchen is currently at the top of my list for updating. So I spent an entire day searching for the perfect glasses to go with my new silverware pattern. I wasn't disappointed with my purchase. The weight and feel of the glasses is right on. Not to heavy, not too light. We tried them out last night and had a couple drinks. Perfect. Thanks Galaxy.
customer_reviews.author: Brunette Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Explodes
customer_reviews.text: Glass exploded on the drain board after sitting there for an hour. Don't keep these glasses. They are dangerous. In garbage now! Don't know why Amazon is still selling them
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Stockton

customer_reviews.title: Most excellent
customer_reviews.text: These arrived quickly, nicely packaged. Everything was in order and not broken. The glasses themselves are heavy thick glass with thick glass at the mouth too. To save space i was able to stack these. I would highly recommend as a gift or personal use. Like most things in Amazon the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Pillitiere

customer_reviews.title: Wrong number of each size.
customer_reviews.text: Package contained 5 medium size glasses and only 3 small size glasses instead of 4 of each. Package had been opened. Was advertised as new.
customer_reviews.author: JackInPV

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses.
customer_reviews.text: I like these quite a lot. I make thick smoothies, and the wider mouth makes it easier to pour into the glass without it dripping down the sides. Good feel. The medium-size glasses make nice "rocks" glasses. We used the juice glasses to replace the etched ones in our bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: gcolvard

customer_reviews.title: Cute Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses somewhat matched what I already had. I love the rock glasses and the juice glasses. They seem very durable and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: They’re nice
customer_reviews.text: These are nice thick glasses. They aren’t thin. I feel like if one accidentally dropped, it might survive. Thumbs up for the time juice glasses!!

customer_reviews.title: Glasses need some padding around them
customer_reviews.text: These glasses Would probably have been awesome except they came in little pieces No padding at all in the box. The outside of the box was not damaged though
customer_reviews.author: Helen H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses, thick and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Glasses thick and sturdy. The middle glass is awkward to hold for a smaller hand. The small glass is very tiny but good for fresh squeezed juices.
customer_reviews.author: Keri Mack

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: They're glasses, how much can you say other than they don't leak? They hold milk and water just fine, however they do seem to leak after the third gin and tonic (kinda strange). They seem to be durable so far although I'm sure my kids will still manage to destroy them all.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: After having for a few weeks I saw a small ...
customer_reviews.text: After having for a few weeks I saw a small crack in the bottom of one of the tallest glasses, its holding together ok but don't recall seeing that when I first got them. Keeping an eye on it. Be sure to inspect them well for cracks when you purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Small
customer_reviews.text: Barbie would love these glasses. I kept them because I can use them as a double shot glass. But they're super small. I was upset when I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Panthermania

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap glass...packing was horrible
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are good. 1 large one was broken upon delivery. I didn't feel like returning them all. So I kept the remaining. Nice glasses. The glass is smooth and easy to hold. Very sturdy. Not cheap glass. Packing was horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amber L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Really nice for the money easy to clean and hold.. they have heavy bottom light tops if not careful could easily be broken in sink with other dishes but so far so good and nothing broke and I have got lots of compliments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Electrical Fluke

customer_reviews.title: Good set of glasses are a bargain.
customer_reviews.text: We are satisfied with the set of glasses. The sizes are useful, they clean well in the dishwasher, and they were a bargain to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but potentially some quality control issues.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets, three of the tall pieces had a small chip on the rim. The packaging seemed fine and I did not find any glass bits inside the box, so likely a quality control issue. Amazon refunded the cost of one set, so I ordered a third set. No damage on the third set. They look nice and appear sturdy. One star docked for the damage, will report back if any notable issues arise.
customer_reviews.author: W. Kim

customer_reviews.title: WORTH
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these about 6 months ago and they actually are pretty good product, still all in tacked and beautiful as when I originally purchased.
customer_reviews.author: iReview

customer_reviews.title: I love the these cups
customer_reviews.text: I love the these cups. They look more valuable than what the price actually is. The small cups are actually a bit smaller than what it looks, when advertised. The only huge disappointment is that two of the large cups were missing from the package. I do not want to return the item, but wish there was a way for me to inquire about them.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Moya

customer_reviews.title: Smooth on outside and durable
customer_reviews.text: Nice glasses with 3 different options for how much you want to drink. They feel pretty solid while holding them, like they won't break easily. Hopefully I won't have to find out. Also, the design is on the inside of the glass so it's smooth on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing and you can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter’s first apartment to coordinate with the flatware and dinnerware sets I also bought, and reviewed, on Amazon. These glasses are amazing! They almost look 3-D! Plain enough but with a real flair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I opened the package and one of the glasses is broken! I tried contacting the business, Home Essentials but there is no website or phone number available. Beautiful glasses but worthless if you can’t use them
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Raya

customer_reviews.title: A very satisfied purchase
customer_reviews.text: From the picture I thought the indentations would be on the outside for better gripping, but they are easy enough to hold and have a surdy base to them. We also like the three sizes, not too large/tall and not too small and narrow with a flimsy base.
customer_reviews.author: Alii's Musings

customer_reviews.title: great glassware for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great set of glassware! I live with 4 other roommates that always use my glassware and I have seen them drop these glasses in the sink while washing them and not even a scratch. The don't look exactly as advertised but thats not a problem. In the photos it looks like the texture is on the outside of the glass, but in reality its on the inside and its nothing more than just bubble like protrusions.
customer_reviews.author: Alexomatic

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This set is great! Sturdy glass and also very nice. I received compliments at our friend get together as well!!
customer_reviews.author: girlygirl17

customer_reviews.title: They arrived broken, and photos on other reviews also show broken glassware.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses were fine in general, however when I received the glasses they were broken, two of the large glasses were broken. I was upset because I was getting an apartment ready for a client and had to go back out and buy more glasses. If they would have not been broken it would’ve been absolutely fine.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: For some reason these looked different from the photo when I received them. The circles are tacky-looking. Aside from that, the glasses just feel kind of cheap, which is understandable, I suppose, considering the price. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Spyglass

customer_reviews.title: Was hesitant to buy.  Final Result:  I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure about the bubbles, but these glasses met the sizes and price I needed so I went ahead and ordered 2 sets after looking up various reviews on-line. All the reviews were high (personal & professional) and when the glasses arrived they lived up to the high reviews. I am very, very pleased with these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Sharing My Experience

customer_reviews.title: Really great! Love the 3 different sizes
customer_reviews.text: Really great! Love the 3 different sizes. We actually use the little juice glasses a lot. We had a similar design from Target but this set is higher quality. The design is sort of embedded in the glass so it feels smooth and the Target ones were more textured. Arrived very well-packed and none of them were broken.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A set of beverage glasses.  Sturdy plus they come In a variety of sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Gee I'm almost ready to replace these. They're water, beverage glasses that are really sturdy, easy to drink out of and a pleasure to have.
customer_reviews.author: Just looking

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice glasses. The sizes are perfect and just what I wanted. When they arrived one was broken. Not due to the shipping because that was well done. I did get a refund and was able to get another set.
customer_reviews.author: debbie green

customer_reviews.title: Nice but broken
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are nice, however one of each size arrived broken. They are not packed well for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Boven

customer_reviews.title: Love having 3 sizes of matching glassware!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets so we’d have 8 of each size. They arrived on time and in perfect condition. It’s hard to find sets that include a juice glass. These seem very sturdy and come out of the dishwasher spotless. So happy I found these, especially since they were nearly 50% off the original price.
customer_reviews.author: L Papa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Groovy glasses!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses turned out to be pretty cool! I get compliments all the time from guests. The glass is thick which surprised me for the price. I just expected the glass to be very thin. Love tbem!
customer_reviews.author: The Evil Dead Girl

customer_reviews.title: Unique Design
customer_reviews.text: These were for my daughter-in-law, she loved them! Need I say more? 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jacki, MN

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had this glassware set for a few months now so I think it is safe to say this was a great buy. They are sturdy, & durable. I place them in the dishwasher as well as hand wash them and they do not have any cracks, scrapes or scratches. It’s not too heavy so it makes it easy to hold. I love the fact that they come in three sizes. The middle size is my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Nadreca Reid

customer_reviews.title: You need to secure your boxes better as it looks like the top wasn't taped or ...
customer_reviews.text: You need to secure your boxes better as it looks like the top wasn't taped or anything and when I opened the box I opened it to this. I'm very lucky to have not hurt myself as I had other items in the box I had to get out of broken glass. P
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Powsney

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cups. If you like the design you should get them. Lightweight but not too thin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality glassware
customer_reviews.text: Good sturdy glass would recommend to all. Ran through dishwasher 20 times by now. No issues comes out sparkling clean. Bought 2 sets to start.
customer_reviews.author: Van R.

customer_reviews.title: Bought off my friend’s wedding registry
customer_reviews.text: Purchased off of my friends wedding registry. Not sure exactly how much she likes them, but she hasn’t returned them or contacted me for any defects!
customer_reviews.author: Katie S

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, lovely. I use the smaller ones for wine, a la my friends in Italy. Stemware is notorious for a) spilling wine easily and b) breaking when it hits the floor. Not so these.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Reader

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Great set of glasses! Clean easily and are very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: KayDee Owens

customer_reviews.title: I live these fun glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great item, dishwasher safe, sturdy made, no defects, packaging was great, nothing was broken when arrived. Fun to offer to guest, or just have at home. Very pleased with this item. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Christie Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Good glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are good glasses and are a good set. Juice, Highball and Tall.
customer_reviews.author: MandBinc

customer_reviews.title: Okay.
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t really like the”4 of each size” package. I would have preferred 12 of the medium size. Nevertheless, the set matches my existing 8 large glasses. I think $2 per glass is a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas r Kincheloe

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not pretty. Too wide for comfort. Came with one broken.
customer_reviews.author: J B B

customer_reviews.title: Love the design
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design, easy to clean, and with different sizes makes portioning drinks easier, especially alcohol ;)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bourque

customer_reviews.title: You’ll live these!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gift. They live them. Attractive and way to hold
customer_reviews.author: KarlaSue

customer_reviews.title: Look amazing
customer_reviews.text: These cups look great and are pretty big too which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: durable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: was thinking the bubble like pattern would make the glass fragile and cheap quality, no..... Dropped these things plenty of times on the wood floors only broke a few. The smallest ones break somewhat easily but that's understandable.
customer_reviews.author: E Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for a couple of years now and love them! They’ve held up well and I’m not exactly “easy” on my glassware. I hand wash themes well. I also live in an area that goes through 4 seasons. Would absolutely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: But theses.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set. Replaced all those odd glasses. 3 sizes which I like. Well with it.
customer_reviews.author: RobertF

customer_reviews.title: Casual drinking set
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase as a home-warming gift. The glasses are sturdy and made well. Gift was received with high praise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegance
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses, thinking about ordering another of this same set
customer_reviews.author: praiseprincess

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: This set of glasses is fantastic! Probably one of the better sets I have ever purchased. Sizes are perfect. I have gotten compliments on them every time I have used them. One person even thought they were antique glasses,they are that cool. Very durable and easy to wash.This might not mean much to you,but I have not broken one yet. If I had more room in my cupboard I would buy another set.I would highly recommend these glasses.They are casual and elegant at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: These are great glasses honestly very pretty looks nice. I love the variety of sizes
customer_reviews.author: tyla griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistency
customer_reviews.text: I like the variety in terms of sizes, and glasses feel sturdy. However one of the large size came broken and one of the middle size was not straight around the rim it had one side rugged and lower than the other.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than drinking out of a metal bucket.
customer_reviews.text: My jerk of a cat loves knocking glasses over onto the hardwood floor. Haven’t broken one yet. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: hlsanford

customer_reviews.title: Strong fit for a clumsy person like me
customer_reviews.text: Dang I dropped one on a wood floor and it didnt break. I am clumsy and we have yet to break any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: College girl
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my daughter she loves them
customer_reviews.author: Syreeta Reid

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses but I was under the impression the design was on he outside making it easier to hold. The texture is on the inside and the outside is completely smooth. Was hoping for the opposite. Other than that, they are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set but the package is not well protected
customer_reviews.text: These glass cups are really nice and favorable price for all the set! The package was not protected in the best way, so when I received, one glass was broken. Other than that, I will totally recommend to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Alburez

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy, quality design for great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very appeased by this product. It is everything that is described in the description. Great quality, very authentic feel and very sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Tu

customer_reviews.title: Cute glasses
customer_reviews.text: Cute glasses. I was worried that they would be broken during shipment but they made it just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses! I was a bit bummed that one of larger glasses was broken when I opened the package but I guess that’s the price for ordering glasses online.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrie Cragg

customer_reviews.title: It’s beautiful looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product but it was left by my front door. I did not authorize to leave it there. I was home all day no one did not knock on the door other than that I loved it most definitely buying another set
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Glassware
customer_reviews.text: Lots of different sizes for different applications, and great for stocking a kitchen upon move in.
customer_reviews.author: patrick kim

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend these without hesitation!
customer_reviews.text: All of the glassware you need for juice, water and/or iced tea. I highly recommend these glasses. They are thick, high quality and are reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Donna F.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the different sizes. There very durable as I dropped one already. Lol. It didn’t even scratch it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am going to order more....
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are great. I love the look and feel of them. Very durable, and look nice. I will be ordering more, and I love the sizes too. The glass is not to thick and not too thin, just right. The dots are in the inside so the outside of the glass is smooth... They hand wash very nicely. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: OceanBreeze376

customer_reviews.title: A glass is a glass - or is it?
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased for a rental unit at the beach. Not only are they very classy looking, they are a nice weight for a glass and hold substance. The price does not match the quality, for I feel these are worth more. Best deal for the $
customer_reviews.author: TMC

customer_reviews.title: Just what Ivwas looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This glassware set is just what I was looking for. It's been very difficult to find a set that includes juice glasses. Mostly what I've found have been sets with tumblers that would be good for mixed drinks, but are too big for just juice at breakfast but this set is perfect for that. I also like the appearance. They have a nice kind of 'bubble' look to them but the outer glass is actually smooth. I highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: mb
